scripts.ver: PKG_VER=$(jq -r .version ./package.json) && echo export const version = \'$PKG_VER\'\; > src/version.ts
scripts.ply-ver: PLY_VER=$(jq -r .version ./node_modules/@ply-ct/ply/package.json) && echo export const plyVersion = \'$PLY_VER\'\; >> src/version.ts
scripts.build: npm run ver && npm run ply-ver && tsc && docker build -t ply-ct/testkube-executor-ply .
scripts.create-exec: kubectl testkube create executor --image ply-ct/testkube-executor-ply --types ply-ct/test --name ply-executor
scripts.create-test: kubectl testkube create test --name ply-demo --git-uri https://github.com/ply-ct/ply-demo.git --type ply-ct/test --job-template job.yaml
scripts.run-test: kubectl testkube run test ply-demo --secret-variable-reference my-sec1=my-secret=sec1
